channel.title: [Project] WarcraftReviews
channel.description:
So I'm starting a new website called WarcraftReviews. Its goal is not just to give a listing of servers sorted by votes, but by reviews and ratings, which you probably figured out by now why I made a topic about sorting with the Bayesian Estimate. As a whole it is incomplete, but has the basics and things needed to have its sole purpose functional. A lot of things will be added, and another goal of it is to have a place for the whole WoW Private Server Community, socializing about events, servers, WoW, etc.
I know the design nor optimization isn't the best, but I would like for you to browse the site and its features for me and find any flaws, tips, comments, advice, whatever. I still have a lot of things to learn, but making a website of this purpose is something I really want to do.
edit: make a topic asking members to test site... don't even give link. the fuck: http://warcraftreviews.net/ just a note, there's already one server that register from asking admins of servers to join. you can test out the reviews on that server to maybe make them feel special.

item.title: [Project] WarcraftReviews
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

So I’m starting a new website called WarcraftReviews. Its goal is not just to give a listing of servers sorted by votes, but by reviews and ratings, which you probably figured out by now why I made a topic about sorting with the Bayesian Estimate. As a whole it is incomplete, but has the basics and things needed to have its sole purpose functional. A lot of things will be added, and another goal of it is to have a place for the whole WoW Private Server Community, socializing about events, servers, WoW, etc.

I know the design nor optimization isn’t the best, but I would like for you to browse the site and its features for me and find any flaws, tips, comments, advice, whatever. I still have a lot of things to learn, but making a website of this purpose is something I really want to do.

edit: make a topic asking members to test site… don’t even give link. the fuck: http://warcraftreviews.net/
just a note, there’s already one server that register from asking admins of servers to join. you can test out the reviews on that server to maybe make them feel special.
